headline: Alphabet and Tesla Earnings, Home Sales and More: What to Watch This Week
summary: Earnings season rolls on this week, with the first of the Magnificent Seven tech names to report, Tesla and Google parent Alphabet. New economic data will shed more light on how tariffs are affecting consumer and business spending, and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is slated to speak on bank regulation.

headline: Honeywell Gears Up to Report Q2 Earnings: Is a Beat in Store?
summary: HON's Q2 2025 results are likely to gain on aerospace and energy strength, though automation softness could weigh on margins.

headline: 2025 Q2 Earnings Season Off To A Strong Start After Bank Reports
summary: Banks kicked off Q2'25 earnings season last week. With results from big banks and 34 other S&P 500 constituents that reported last week, Q2 growth propelled to 5.6% from 4.8% the prior week.

raw.headline: 2025 Q2 Earnings Season Off To A Strong Start After Bank Reports
raw.summary: Banks kicked off Q2'25 earnings season last week. With results from big banks and 34 other S&P 500 constituents that reported last week, Q2 growth propelled to 5.6% from 4.8% the prior week.
